about.professionalIntroContent: Passionate about the ever-evolving world of technology, I am on a continuous journey to broaden my horizons. I am eagerly looking forward to delving into new tech, refining my existing skills
about.name: Gyn Nguyen
about.visionContent_1: With accumulated experience, I serve as a Back-end Developer specializing in designing and maintaining servers, databases, and developing APIs for system integration, ensuring applications are secure, efficient, and scalable. I am proficient in SQL database management systems such as MySQL and SQL Server for flexible structured data processing.
about.visionContent_2: Simultaneously, in my role as a Business Analyst, I gather requirements from stakeholders, analyze business processes and data to support decision-making. I act as a bridge between technical teams and business stakeholders, ensuring requirements are understood and resolved effectively. My strength lies in evaluating the efficiency of current processes, identifying bottlenecks, and proposing improvements.
about.visionContent_3: Long-term goals: Develop professional capabilities to solve complex problems more effectively, learn new technologies, enhance skills, and tackle challenges requiring high precision and reliability.

experience.experienceSummaryContent: Với hơn 4 năm kinh nghiệm trong phát triển phần mềm, tôi đã làm việc với nhiều công nghệ và dự án đa dạng, từ hệ thống quản lý đến ứng dụng web phức tạp.

hd.title: Business Analyst & Developer
hd.achievement1: Gathered, analyzed, and evaluated stakeholder requirements, then identified and proposed technical solution approaches
hd.achievement2: Built and maintained servers, email hosting solutions, and centralized system management platforms
hd.achievement3: Designed, developed, and coordinated IT systems, policies, and standard operating procedures across the organization
hd.achievement4: Developed and launched audit tools (.Net 8), promotional 'Lucky Draw' applications (PHP), visitor check-in systems (Javascript), and ongoing maintenance projects (.NET 8)
hd.achievement5: UX/UI design initiatives—producing key visuals, standees, product mockups, and animated graphics (Figma)

acacy.title: Back-end Developer
acacy.achievement1: Developed and extended software features using .NET 8 and Dapper
acacy.achievement2: Built and optimized complex SQL queries and stored procedures for high-performance data access
acacy.achievement3: Performed data analysis with SQL PIVOT to generate actionable business insights
acacy.achievement4: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to meet stakeholder requirements

xteam.title: Server Administrator & Developer
xteam.achievement1: Developed, managed and optimized FiveM GTA V servers (Lua, JavaScript, C#) for high performance and security with over 2000 users online
xteam.achievement2: Cultivated a vibrant player community through regular events and active moderation
xteam.achievement3: Collaborated with An Phat Computer, Mixi City, NimoTV, BigCity and custom development integrations as well as co-hosting events
